column4: Hi, this is strange .... can you upgrade from 11.10 to the beta via do-release-upgrade -d ? src : https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PrecisePangolin/TechnicalOverview/Beta2
wow that's odd ! I'm sure you couldn't do that before ! :/
so once I upgrade to the beta will I be able to do-release-upgrade once 12.04 LTS goes live ?
